Title: Cut Ties
Plot: The murder of a fellow marshal throws Raylan together with a former female colleague, and Art leaves the office to track down another angle of the case. Meanwhile, Boyd engineers a showdown with Dickie Bennett, despite Raylan's effort to prevent it.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language,drug use and sexual references
GuestStars: Mykelti Williamson, Jeremy Davies, Clayne Crawford, Michael Harding, Damon Herriman, Frank John Hughes, Bonnie Root, Todd Stashwick, Lenny Citrano, Demetrius Grosse, Cleavon McClendon, Carla Gugino
